name: Queue
description: Marks the tasks that are in queue to be assigned

name: Clarify
description: Marks the tasks that need clarification to proceed to work or estimate

name: Actionable
description: The dev can start working on the task

name: In Progress
description: The dev has started to work on this task

name: QA
description: Task is being QAed, or is in QA pipeline

name: Delivery
description: Task is ready to be delivered

name: Close
description: Task can be closed and moved out of pipeline
